# Setup
You may need to install the package (Note that while this is private, it may require your GitHub PAT to install)
```{r install}
devtools::install_github("kvitense/LM_Chla@initialCodeReview")
```

Download the data
```{r downloadData}
df <- LMChla::assembleData(test = T, out = "fullData", binaryOut = TRUE)

```
